name: St. Lukes Meridian Hospital
description: Meridian: Drive-up tent screening and specimen collection for testing is available at St. Luke's Meridian hospital, 520 S. Eagle Rd, Meridian, ID 83642, Monday to Sunday, 10 a.m. to 6 p.m

name: St. Luke's Plaza - Boise
description: Drive-up tent screening and specimen collection for testing is available on the north side of St. Luke's Plaza campus building

name: St. Luke's McCall Medical Center
description: To help manage the flow of traffic, the parking lot is to be accessed from Forest Street. The east driveway, adjacent to the hospital, will be the entrance and the west driveway, adjacent to the clinic, will be the exit. All patients, visitors and contractors will be greeted at their car before entering the St. Lukeâ€™s hospital and clinic parking lot from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m., Monday to Friday and 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. on Saturdays and Sundays. Suspected COVID-19 patients will be screened at their cars by appointment only and, if needed, have a sample collected for testing. To make an appointment call 208-634-1776.

name: St. Luke's Surgery Center at the Magic Valley
alternate_name: St. Luke's Surgery Center at the Magic Valley
description: Drive-up tent screening and specimen collection for testing will be available at St. Luke's Surgery Center at the Magic Valley campus, 575 Pole Line Rd. W., Twin Falls, ID, 83301, Monday to Sunday, 10 a.m. to 6 p.m.

name: North Nampa - Saltzer Health
description: Curbside screening and specimen collection for testing available at both Saltzer locations in Nampa. Saltzer patients can contact 208-463-3000 and press 7 for nurse triage.

name: South Nampa - Saltzer Health
description: Curbside screening and specimen collection for testing available at both Saltzer locations in Nampa. Saltzer patients can contact 208-463-3000 and press 7 for nurse triage.

name: Meridian Crossroads - Primary Health Medical Group
description: Patients can be evaluated and have samples collected at respiratory clinics in Garden City, Meridian and Nampa. Patients are asked to all ahead for a same-day appointment and remain in the car upon arrival.

name: Garden City - Primary Health Medical Group
description: Patients can be evaluated and have samples collected at respiratory clinics in Garden City, Meridian and Nampa. Patients are asked to all ahead for a same-day appointment and remain in the car upon arrival.

name: Nampa - Primary Health Medical Group
description: Patients can be evaluated and have samples collected at respiratory clinics in Garden City, Meridian and Nampa. Patients are asked to all ahead for a same-day appointment and remain in the car upon arrival.

name: Meridian Health Plaza Urgent Care
description: Saint Alphonsus is currently offering drive-up COVID-19 assessments in Ada and Canyon county. If a patient arrives at a screening location but does not meet the criteria for testing, they will be provided education on virus prevention and risk factors.

name: Garrity Urgent Care
description: Saint Alphonsus is currently offering drive-up COVID-19 assessments in Ada and Canyon county. If a patient arrives at a screening location but does not meet the criteria for testing, they will be provided education on virus prevention and risk factors.
